scripts.serve: yarn concurrently "yarn gridsome develop" "nodemon --ext js,vue --watch '../_shared-components/' --exec 'yarn upgrade shared-components'"
scripts.serve:static: yarn concurrently "nodemon --ext js,vue --watch '../_shared-components/' --exec 'yarn upgrade shared-components && yarn gridsome build && yarn http-server ./dist/'"
scripts.serve:local: yarn concurrently "export NODE_ENV=local yarn gridsome develop" "nodemon --ext js,vue --watch '../_shared-components/' --exec 'yarn upgrade shared-components'"
